Shows your OSRS boss records.

**Usage**

- `/bossrecords rsn:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `rsn` | `string` | Yes | The runescape username you want to check. | - |
